treatment-md.title: Andronymus fontainei Larsen, 2012, sp.nov.
treatment-md.article-title: The genus Ampittia in Africa with the description of a new species (Hesperiinae; Aeromachini) and three new species in the genera Andronymus and Chondrolepis (Hesperiinae, incertae sedis) (Lepidoptera; Hesperiidae)
